Mainstream users:
* Do not want to see hashes.
* Do not want to download a browser Extension or dedicated app to access dApps.
* Do not want to use hardware wallets.
* Do not want to think about (or pay) gas costs.
* Do not want to wait for transactions to mine or blocks to sync.
